name: Road Warrior [Roguelike] text only
description:
the car tiles in this game are for fun, you have the option to go plain text only

carwars in the near future, hunting for parts, avoiding gangs,battleing with other cars. the uneaque selling point is directional damage on a six cell text character car, ewith armor on each cell. so ram someone you will damage the front , get ramed in sidesrear front engine etc...
